title: hodlmybtc
author: hodlmybtc
created_time: July 03, 2022, 02:42:05 AMLast edit: July 08, 2022, 10:25:14 PM by hodlmybtc
content: Hi there, I'm auctioning a 2014 Cryptonic Monero pure silver physical coin. They are the first physical Monero coins ever produced and they are very rare, there are only a couple auctions of these coins (pure silver and silver plated) found on the internet. The only similar succesful trade that I know of is that someone bought a 2014 Cryptonic pure silver coin for $1700 in 2017. Because of this it's hard to estimate the value of the coin, if you think it's not worth it please refrain from posting in the thread.I am the original owner of this coin and can post the e-mail I received when I ordered the coin from Cryptonic, also the owner of Cryptonic posted in my reputation thread and trust page.Photos: upper ones made with normal lighting, bottom ones made with flash from my phone. These are older photos of a silver plated coin I have but the pure silver coin up for auction here looks the same, if you want I could post new photos of the coin up for this auction.Please limit posts to bids or comments/questions about the item for auction.STARTING BID: 0.115 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001 BTCBUY IT NOW: 0.2 BTCEND TIME: JULY 10TH, 2022, 23:59:59 Amsterdam timeESCROW: If you want we can use a trusted escrow on this site, I haven't been on here for a long time so I don't know who currently is a trusted escrow here.Payment due within 24 hours of auction end.SNIPE: Any bid made in last hour will extend the auction 15 minutes.If within that extended hour a new bid is made, 15 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC, can also accept ETH, XMR and USDT if that is fine with the potential escrow too, if you want to pay in another cryptocurrency we can discuss that.SHIPPING: Shipping fees included and based on location and preference

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Nice... If you can send me the coin-code (It's two parts, it's on the rim of the coin), I can (possibly) tell you exactly which run it was from and the mintage of it, just pm it to me. thanks!  Also yeah some photos of actual coin for auction would be great.

comments.author: hodlmybtc
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on July 03, 2022, 02:45:03 AMNice... If you can send me the coin-code (It's two parts, it's on the rim of the coin), I can (possibly) tell you exactly which run it was from and the mintage of it, just pm it to me. thanks!  Also yeah some photos of actual coin for auction would be great. We talked about it last year  you can verify this in your PMs, need to go to sleep now, can post the photos tomorrowSecond batch of pure silver Moneroj 2014Release date: 2015-04-08.999 Fine Silver Monero coin. Weight: 1.08 Oz. Diameter 34 mm. Thickness 3 mm. Second batch of pure silver Moneroj 2014. It has the following words on the front side of the coin: Vivu la Financa Libereco. 10 coins in this batch.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: hodlmybtc on July 03, 2022, 02:50:43 AMWe talked about it last year  you can verify this in your PMs, need to go to sleep now, can post the photos tomorrowSecond batch of pure silver Moneroj 2014Release date: 2015-04-08.999 Fine Silver Monero coin. Weight: 1.08 Oz. Diameter 34 mm. Thickness 3 mm. Second batch of pure silver Moneroj 2014. It has the following words on the front side of the coin: Vivu la Financa Libereco. 10 coins in this batch.Oh damn, sorry my bad, I forgot all about that!! This is a very rare coin, I wish you luck, good to see one of the "OG XMR coins" here again (Other than Vigens' joke-coin lol)...

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: just to note - you have two auction threads up for this same coin - or do you have 2 of them and are doing separate auctions for each?

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on July 03, 2022, 03:38:12 AMjust to note - you have two auction threads up for this same coin - or do you have 2 of them and are doing separate auctions for each?Difference is this one is pure silver and the other one is silver plated brass/alloy.

comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on July 03, 2022, 03:43:55 AMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on July 03, 2022, 03:38:12 AMjust to note - you have two auction threads up for this same coin - or do you have 2 of them and are doing separate auctions for each?Difference is this one is pure silver and the other one is silver plated brass/alloy.gotcha! thank you - I tried to see a difference and could not find one - thank you for pointing it out.

comments.author: hodlmybtc
comments.body: Updated the post with new photosApparantly I switched up the coins in the past, this coin doesn't have any tarnish spots only some minor imperfections which have been there since I reveived them from CryptonicAlso changed the sniping rulesQuote from: owlcatz on July 03, 2022, 02:53:39 AMQuote from: hodlmybtc on July 03, 2022, 02:50:43 AMWe talked about it last year  you can verify this in your PMs, need to go to sleep now, can post the photos tomorrowSecond batch of pure silver Moneroj 2014Release date: 2015-04-08.999 Fine Silver Monero coin. comments.author: hodlmybtc
comments.body: Lowered starting bid because of btc price increase

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: A great coin. I believe this is also the first precious metal cryptocoin to use colored epoxy in it’s design/production. You don’t see them trade hands very often. Good luck with your sale of this piece. It’s definitely a good one to have for any physical crypto collection.

comments.author: hodlmybtc
comments.body: Auction ended, if anyone is still interested you can send a pm, perphaps I'll put it up for auction again soonQuote from: OgNasty on July 10, 2022, 06:26:55 PMA great coin. I believe this is also the first precious metal cryptocoin to use colored epoxy in it’s design/production. You don’t see them trade hands very often. Good luck with your sale of this piece. It’s definitely a good one to have for any physical crypto collection. For sure! Didn't even know that about the production, so thanks fot that!
